      • getChoice

        public int getChoice(int min,
                     int max)
        This method prompt the user for input and checks for validation.
        Parameters:
        min - number of choice user can enter.
        max - number of choice user can enter.
        Returns:
        valid choice

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName(int choice)
        According to the action of the user This method prompt the user to enter the filename for txt and xml files.
        Parameters:
        choice - for the filename.
        Returns:
        true for the valid filename.

      • startRace

        public void startRace(RunnerDAO runnerDAO)
        This method gets runners from the selected data source. Creates a new thread for each runner. Maintains thread in a arrayList. start each thread. Checks and Ignores invalid data in data source files.
        Parameters:
        runnerDAO - manages data from all the data sources.

      • waitInput

        public void waitInput()
        Wait for the user to press enter key to continue further.

      • finished

        public static void finished(java.lang.Thread winner)
        This method is synchronized so that only one thread enter at a time. Declares winner. Interrupts rest of the thread.
        Parameters:
        winner - thread access this function.
